testcase.name: User can checkout product successfuly
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User logged in with valid credentials..................................passed Then User is navigated to the product page..................................passed When User adds a product to the cart........................................passed And User clicks on the cart icon............................................passed Then User verify the product is added to cart...............................passed When User clicks on the checkout button.....................................passed Then User is navigated to the checkout page.................................passed When User fills in the checkout information with valid data.................passed Then User verify the selected product in the overview list..................passed When User clicks on the finish button.......................................passed Then User should see the order confirmation page............................passed
